modName: Drelas Follower-Player Home-More Conjurable Creatures and Unique Robe
summary: Drelas is now your follower and his home is yours along with a new robe set and many new conjuration spells.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Cmo2Cd9.jpg[/img]
The hostile mage found in a secluded cottage is now your follower dawning a new robe one for you as well. Drelas' home is yours as well now and contains all the necessities of a player home. Many new conjuration spells are also added.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/TVfwstF.png[/img]
[u]Robes:[/u]The new robe set can be found after asking to see Drelas' inventory through the companion menu.
[u]Follower:[/u]Drelas is your new follower and can be found outdoors sitting on a chair in front of his garden. He uses some of the spells added in the mod, mostly four legged mammals. He wears the new robes with no enchantments.
[u]Home:[/u]The home features a forge set (found outdoors), alchemy lab, enchanter, a cooking pot, book shelves (23 Books), back story to Drelas and the new spell books.
[u]Back Story:[/u]Drelas' back story can be found in his journal in a book shelf on the main floor. Please keep in mind the life span of a Dark Elf when reading.
[u]Map:[/u]Once you travel to this location you will receive a map marker for fast travel.
[u]Spells:[/u]The spell books to learn the new spells are added into a dwemer chest on the top floor near the foot of the bed. Each spell is similar to the Conjure Familiar Spell. Here is a list of all the conjurable creatures added in this mod.
All Bears
All Spriggans
All Foxes

Thank you CeaseSphire for this great video!
[youtube]0HUbRkMSZRw[/youtube]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/cQJf7QY.png[/img]
Creatures from the DLCs.
Utilities for homes from the DLCs.
Draugr, Skeleton and Corrupted Shades conjuration spells.
Your suggestions will all be considered so suggestions from you may be added in a future update.
Maybe a quest?

[u]Updates[/u]
[u]1.1.0[/u]
-Drelas can now be married.
-There is now a double bed rather than a single bed.
-The "Conjure Flaming Familiar" is now removed because it is part of a quest.
-Drelas carries soul capturing weapons.
-2 staffs (Staff of the Familiar and Staff of Soul Trapping) are found above the dinner table.
-Wagon and floating hay piles are removed.
-A smelter is now found with the forge.

[u]!NOTE!:[/u] This mod is compatible with Blaze of Eventide by Alek and the book is found in the same place.
author: The Mad Meister
